articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Richardson claims gold for US in 100m at World Athletics Championships - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Favourites Shericka Jackson and Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce from Jamaica take silver and bronze.
articles.content:
ShaCarri Richardson of the United States stunned Jamaicas pre-race favourites from the outside lane to win the 100 metres world title at the World Athletics Championships in Budapest.
Richardson cru… [+4570 chars]

articles.author: Alastair Talbot
articles.title: Hilarious clip shows injured Inter Miami defender Ian Fray dancing on crutches while Lionel Messi's team celeb - Daily Mail
articles.description: After Miami beat Nashville in a tense penalty shootout on Saturday night, the 21-year-old centre-back made his way onto the field at Geodis Park to celebrate the club's first ever trophy in its five-year history.
articles.content: Hilarious footage from Inter Miami's Leagues Cup final win shows injured defender Ian Fray joining his teammates in post-game festivities and dancing on crutches, just a few weeks after Lionel Messi … [+2511 chars]
